resources.string:
The sample control extension starts an animation on the accessory when started. This extension supports SmartWatch2, SmartWatch and Smart Wireless Headset pro.

In SmartWatch the animation can be stopped by tapping on the screen. 

Smart Wireless Headset pro shows a scrolling text that can be paused and resumed with Play/Pause key. The text can also be manually controlled by using the the Previous and Next Keys. Control animation speed can be changed using Volume up and Volume down key.
